value:
$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Is that...Líf? And Thrasir?$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|Absent their minds... Mother tugs at
the strings of their bodies...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Just how far will you descend into
the depths of desecration, Hel?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|Ready up! The enemy's almost here!$k$p$Sbs1000|
$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Advance!$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Hel... I shall kill you.$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|I'm sorry, but...might I ask a favor of
you, $Nu?$k$pI have something I need to get off my
chest, and...you are the only one
I trust completely.$k$pCan you meet me tonight? Alone?$k$pPlease, keep this between us, if you
would, $Nu...$k$p$Sbs150|
